hero_content: I am currently a Full-Stack developer in Lookiero, and I am also specialized in cybersecurity 🧑‍💻. I really like learning and developing new things, it's a perfect hobby to listen to music, which is what I like the most in the world and makes me work harder. 🎧🎧
about_me:
Hello my name is Toni Peraira! I am a father 👨‍👧 and Full-Stack developer passionate about learning new things. I love learning new technologies and be up to date about what's new in the world of development and cibersecurity.

One of the things I like the most about programming is that it allows me to find solutions for everything, that's why I'm a big fan of scripting. If I have to do anything, I'm sure it can be automated with a script.

I have a better time on the Frontend, which is the least I touch 😟.

One day I would like to become a master of JavaScript, but it changes every year so it's hard to follow 😂

Always ready to have fun with new challenges. But no challenge can be tougher than being the parent of a baby 👶.
Una vez me dejé el freno de mano puesto: My car in the middle of the forest.
A veces voy de público a la TV, como los: Sometimes I go to TV, like old people. They give free sandwiches.
